setName.summary: Changes NPC's name to a new one in instant storyaction

setSkin.summary: Changes NPC's skin name to a provided one in instant storyaction. Skin texture is taken from resource location `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/entity/npc/<skin name>`

setModel.summary: Changes NPC's model name to a provided one in instant storyaction. Model is taken from resource location `storyanvil_cogwheel:geo/entity/<model name>.geo.json`

chat.summary: Makes NPC say provided string in instant storyaction

pathfind.summary: Makes NPC find and follow path to provided coordinates in storyaction

waitForLabel.summary: Makes NPC wait (with storyaction that completes when StoryAction with label ends) util StoryAction with provided label was executed

animation.summary: Makes NPC play animation with provided name for provided amount of ticks

dialogChoices.summary: Allows player to choice one of provided dialog choices. NPC ask question in newly added instant storyaction. Script will wait util player answers and this storyaction was completed. You can provide any amount of cogstrings as arguments

dialogBlocking.summary: Makes NPC say provided text with UI taking provided amount of ticks in time. This property makes script wait utill NPC finishes talking. Texture is taken from resource location `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/dialog/<provided texture name>.png`.

dialogNonBlocking.summary: Makes NPC say provided text with UI taking provided amount of ticks in time. This property **does not** make script wait utill NPC finishes talking. Texture is taken from resource location `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/dialog/<provided texture name>.png`.

dialogChoiceUI.summary: Makes NPC ask player to choose an option. First provided CogString is NPC's question. Last CogString is texture name for UI (Actual texture is taken from resource location `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/dialog/<provided texture name>.png`). All other CogStrings are options for player to select. Returns index of selected option
